last_episode_to_air.name: The Long Goodbye Job
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nate puts everything on the line for himself and his team when he takes on a case that is connected to his son's death.

name: Leverage
overview: A five-person team comprised of a thief, a grifter, a hacker, and a retrieval specialist, led by former insurance investigator Nathan Ford, use their skills to fight corporate and governmental injustices inflicted on ordinary citizens.

episodes.name: The Nigerian Job
episodes.overview: A desperate aerospace CEO asks Nate Ford - an insurance investigator who once specialized in recovering stolen goods worth millions - to lead a team of expert thieves to recover airplane designs from the rival company that took them.

episodes.name: The Homecoming Job
episodes.overview: Leverage Consulting & Associates opens for business as the crew reunites to help a Reservist who's been wounded in Iraq by private military contractors.

episodes.name: The Two-Horse Job
episodes.overview: After a Wall Street broker sets fire to his stable—killing his underachieving racehorses in the process, the team visits Kentucky to help the heartsick trainer, Eliot’s high school love.

episodes.name: The Miracle Job
episodes.overview: Nate's childhood best friend seeks the help of Leverage Consulting & Associates in preventing the demolition of his church... by stealing a miracle.

episodes.name: The Bank Shot Job
episodes.overview: Sophie and Nate find themselves taken hostage during a bank robbery. They soon learn they are trapped inside with their latest target: a corrupt judge.

episodes.name: The Stork Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team works to take down an adoption agency that has been stealing money from American couples.

episodes.name: The Wedding Job
episodes.overview: To pull of a heist, the team poses as wedding planners in order to get money promised to a family after they took the fall for a Mafia boss.

episodes.name: The Mile High Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team attempts to expose a conglomerate’s cover-up of their toxic fertilizer, which has resulted in the death of a young girl. But the CEO has put all of the damning evidence on a plane to the Cayman Islands. The team races to catch the flight but, once airborne, they discover that the CEO’s intentions are far more sinister and that to avenge one life they’ll have to save their own.

episodes.name: The Snow Job
episodes.overview: While helping a National Guardsman, Nate puts his team on the line when he slips back into his alcoholic ways.

episodes.name: The 12-Step Job
episodes.overview: When the team cons an addicted embezzler into entering rehab, Nate confronts some of his own issues regarding alcoholism.

episodes.name: The Juror #6 Job
episodes.overview: When one of Parker's aliases receives jury duty, Nate forces her to go, resulting in a showdown between the team and a corporation tampering with the jury.

episodes.name: The First David Job (1)
episodes.overview: The team puts together a plan to steal Nate's former boss's prized Michelangelo Maquette and sell it back to him.

episodes.name: The Second David Job (2)
episodes.overview: Nate tries to piece together his team after coming out of hiding. However, the high stakes involved in his latest con could spell disaster for him and his friends.

episodes.name: The Beantown Bailout Job
episodes.overview: Nate, now sober, grudgingly reassembles the team to pit the local Irish mob against a banker who is gaming a government bailout. If they live, Nate has four thieves to deal with who believe he needs them in his life, whether he likes it or not.

episodes.name: The Tap Out Job
episodes.overview: The crew work to get a corrupt mixed martial arts promoter to invest all he has into a phony cable network, but their con is discovered. Now it is Elliot's job to throw a fight.

episodes.name: The Order 23 Job
episodes.overview: The team must commandeer a full hospital floor in order to quarantine a convicted felon and get him to reveal the location of the stolen money, or die.

episodes.name: The Fairy Godparents Job
episodes.overview: Nate and his team continue to remove greed by focusing in on a avaricious investment banker. They'll pose as "fairy godparents" to the awkward son of the white collar crook.

episodes.name: The Three Days of the Hunter Job
episodes.overview: The crew uses the world of government conspiracies to raise paranoia and expose a callous tabloid newscaster as a fraud.

episodes.name: The Top Hat Job
episodes.overview: The crew takes on a corrupt corporation which is marketing tainted foods. The scheme team needs to be tricky: they will put on a fake magic show so they can slip by the tight security.

episodes.name: The Two Live Crew Job
episodes.overview: Nate and his crew square off against a band of thieves in order to retrieve priceless stolen artwork.

episodes.name: The Ice Man Job
episodes.overview: Hardison fills in for Sophie as the inside man when the team sets their sights on an unscrupulous diamond merchant.

episodes.name: The Lost Heir Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team targets a shady lawyer looking to usurp his client's estate, with Parker playing the client's long-lost daughter. With Sophie still out of the picture, the team works with an uptight lawyer as a chaperone, but there may be more to her than meets the eye. Summer season finale.

episodes.name: The Runway Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team cons the owners of a clothing company after their employees are mistreated.

episodes.name: The Bottle Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE team runs a high-tech version of a classic con on a predatory loan shark in order to save McRory’s bar.

episodes.name: The Zanzibar Marketplace Job
episodes.overview: The team is forced to work with their old enemy Sterling in order to free Nate’s ex-wife, Maggie from a Ukrainian jail and clear her name.

episodes.name: The Future Job
episodes.overview: The team goes after a con man masquerading as a psychic medium in order to drain the life savings of his bereaved clients.

episodes.name: The Three Strikes Job (1)
episodes.overview: While trying to take down a corrupt local mayor exploiting his love of baseball, the Leverage team runs into an unexpected complication.

episodes.name: The Maltese Falcon Job (2)
episodes.overview: Surrounded by FBI, the team decides to hide in plain sight, while continuing to take down the corrupt mayor and his gunrunning partner. Little do they suspect that Nate has a different endgame in mind for them all.

episodes.name: The Jailhouse Job
episodes.overview: In order to save the life of an innocent inmate, Nate must bring down the corrupt warden of the Super-Max prison where he’s currently incarcerated and escape… whether he wants to or not.

episodes.name: The Reunion Job
episodes.overview: To uncover a password, the team infiltrates the high school reunion of an amoral software magnate who’s the IT department for the Axis of Evil.

episodes.name: The Inside Job
episodes.overview: When Parker is trapped in an unknown location while working a theft for her mentor, the LEVERAGE team must race the clock to find her and free her.

episodes.name: The Scheherazade Job
episodes.overview: To rob an African kleptocrat's Boston vault, the LEVERAGE team has to time their heist to a symphony concert nearby, where amateur violinist Hardison must play a solo for a sell-out crowd.

episodes.name: The Double-Blind Job
episodes.overview: Nate and the team infiltrate the world of Big Pharma to take down a corrupt CEO before he can release a drug that will kill thousands.

episodes.name: The Studio Job
episodes.overview: To take down a corrupt record executive, the LEVERAGE crew infiltrates the world of country & western music, inadvertently turning Eliot into a genuine country music star.

episodes.name: The Gone Fishin' Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE crew aims to turn the tables on a greedy debt collector stealing from innocent taxpayers, but finds themselves in over their heads when they discover that their target is also a domestic terrorist funding an armed militia.

episodes.name: The Boost Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE team dives into the high-octane world of master car thieves in order to take down a crooked car dealer.

episodes.name: The Three-Card Monte Job
episodes.overview: When innocent small businessmen are blackmailed into committing crimes, the team's investigation reveals an unlikely foe behind the scheme: Jimmy Ford, Nate’s father.

episodes.name: The Underground Job
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of a deadly mine explosion, the team infiltrates the coal mines of West Virginia to put an end to the dangerous practices of the mine’s owner.  But what the team digs up will threaten the livelihood of everyone in this tight-knit community.

episodes.name: The Rashomon Job
episodes.overview: The team discover that viewpoints differ, when they compare notes and find out that five years ago, each of them tried to steal the same rare artifact.

episodes.name: The King George Job
episodes.overview: When the team finds out that an antiquities trafficker working for Moreau is using refugee children as mules to smuggle artifacts, they travel to London to lure him into an Auction House scam. While there, Sophie confronts the consequences of her past. James Frain guest-stars.

episodes.name: The Morning After Job
episodes.overview: To get a violent hedge fund manager to reveal information that could lead to Damien Moreau, the Leverage team convinces the man that he has murdered Parker, not knowing that their con has made the rogue financier the target of assassins.

episodes.name: The Ho, Ho, Ho Job
episodes.overview: The team takes over a mall on Christmas Eve and uncovers a scheme perpetrated by an old nemesis; Eliot goes undercover as Santa Claus; Parker and Hardison are Santa's helpers.

episodes.name: The Big Bang Job (1)
episodes.overview: The team infiltrates a government research lab to stop Damien Moreau from auctioning information to international terrorists.

episodes.name: The San Lorenzo Job (2)
episodes.overview: After following Moreau to San Lorenzo, the team discovers that he is chief advisor to the current President.

episodes.name: The Long Way Down Job
episodes.overview: To take down a corrupt financier, the LEVERAGE team must recover lost evidence high up on a mountain, racing hired guns and killer weather.

episodes.name: The 10 Li'l Grifters Job
episodes.overview: When a mark is killed suddenly in the middle of a sting, the team must scramble to complete the con and find the killer…before Nate goes down for murder.

episodes.name: The 15 Minutes Job
episodes.overview: To take down a corrupt PR consultant, the LEVERAGE team must build him up as a hero, then use his own methods against him.

episodes.name: The Van Gogh Job
episodes.overview: On the trail of a lost Van Gogh, the team learns the painting was the center of a World War II love story between a black soldier and the white heiress he was forced to leave behind.

episodes.name: The Hot Potato Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE team infiltrates the corrupt world of corporate agriculture to recover a stolen object worth millions: a one-of-a-kind potato.

episodes.name: The Carnival Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE team infiltrates a high-tech home to steal a revolutionary computer chip, only to have the family’s child abducted from a carnival during the heist.

episodes.name: The Grave Danger Job
episodes.overview: The LEVERAGE crew aims their sights on a charming funeral director who embezzles money from her grieving mourners, then discovers she is also selling the identities of the recently deceased to a deadly Mexican drug cartel.

episodes.name: The Boiler Room Job
episodes.overview: When the LEVERAGE team goes up against a conman from a long lineage of greats, they must pull off the biggest con of their careers.

episodes.name: The Cross My Heart Job
episodes.overview: The team goes after an ailing defense contractor who steals a 15-year-old boy's intended heart for his own. With time running out before the boy dies, the team has to run the con at an airport while they're stuck on a layover.

episodes.name: The Queen's Gambit Job
episodes.overview: Jim Sterling asks Nate for help taking down a researcher who has designed a nuclear weight that will allow a terrorist nation to manufacture enriched uranium. However, it soon becomes clear that the Interpol agent has an ulterior motive, one which isolates Nate, gets Sophie arrested, and takes Eliot out of commission.

episodes.name: The Experimental Job
episodes.overview: When homeless veterans in the Boston area begin disappearing, the team must go back to college and infiltrate the world of Skull & Bones secret societies

episodes.name: The Office Job
episodes.overview: Uncovering a simple embezzlement scam becomes anything but simple when the team becomes part of a documentary shooting at the company they’re trying to save.

episodes.name: The Girls' Night Out Job
episodes.overview: When a James-Bond-like thief targets Parker's friend Peggy, Parker recruits Sophie and Tara to help her and, together, the women of Leverage follow the thief to the Venezuelan Consulate, where they discover an international conspiracy.

episodes.name: The Boys' Night Out Job
episodes.overview: Nate, Eliot and Hardison are forced to intervene when Hurley returns, embroiled with the best of intentions in a three-way drug deal.

episodes.name: The Lonely Hearts Job
episodes.overview: While searching for a philanthropist’s missing wife, the team comes up against a grifter ring running a web of sophisticated “Sweetheart Scams”. Now, Nate must learn how to steal hearts… or risk losing Sophie’s for good.

episodes.name: The Gold Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team hits the recession-driven Cash-for-Gold industry by targeting a corrupt brother-sister team and steering them through an elaborate treasure hunt.

episodes.name: The Radio Job (1)
episodes.overview: When Latimer hires Nate’s father to pull off a heist in an ultra-secure government office, the Leverage team must stage a fake hostage stand-off when they’re trapped inside and the feds lay siege to the building.

episodes.name: The Last Dam Job (2)
episodes.overview: The Leverage team must recruit old friends and rivals in order to take down Latimer and a foe from their past.

episodes.name: The (Very) Big Bird Job
episodes.overview: When a shipping CEO’s cost-cutting measures result in a plane crash, the Leverage team cons him into buying the largest plane ever built – the Spruce Goose – in order to expose him before a merger is completed that would put more lives at risk.

episodes.name: The Blue Line Job
episodes.overview: While trying to save a stubborn hockey enforcer from sustaining permanent injury in the playoffs, the Leverage crew discovers that someone has nefarious designs on the team.

episodes.name: The First Contact Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team takes down a wealthy scientist who stole his former research partner's discovery and ruined his reputation. Their tactic is to convince him he's made first contact with aliens..

episodes.name: The French Connection Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team goes inside the world of culinary schools and celebrity chefs to bring down a corrupt restaurateur who destroys lives in his pursuit of fame and money.

episodes.name: The Gimme a K Street Job
episodes.overview: To take down a competitive cheerleading company that profits by putting teenage girls at risk, the team must tackle its most corrupt foe yet: Congress.

episodes.name: The D. B. Cooper Job
episodes.overview: A dying FBI Agent's greatest failure – allowing skyjacker D.B. Cooper to escape justice –becomes Nate's obsession as he looks back to the '70s to solve one of America's great mysteries.

episodes.name: The Real Fake Car Job
episodes.overview: The Leverage team fakes the discovery of a legendary antique car in order to convince a Wall Street fraud to break the immunity deal that protects him from prosecution.

episodes.name: The Broken Wing Job
episodes.overview: When a broken leg leaves Parker behind on the crew’s latest job, she spies on the Brew Pub’s customers for fun and discovers a group of thieves planning a heist.

episodes.name: The Rundown Job
episodes.overview: Eliot, Hardison and Parker join Colonel Vance in a race to stop a terrorist from launching a biological attack on Washington, D.C.

episodes.name: The Frame-Up Job
episodes.overview: When Sophie is implicated in the theft of a valuable painting, Nate must use all his skills as an investigator to find the real culprit and clear her name.

episodes.name: The Low Low Price Job
episodes.overview: To take out a crooked super-store owner who threatens a small town, the Leverage team must sabotage his operation.

episodes.name: The White Rabbit Job
episodes.overview: To stop a businessman from selling off his company and ruining the town that survives because of it, the Leverage team must pull off the most difficult con ever.

episodes.name: The Corkscrew Job
episodes.overview: The team travels into Oregon wine country to steal a rare bottle of wine as part of their current con.

episodes.name: The Toy Job
episodes.overview: To stop a crooked CEO who is going to release a dangerous toy onto the market, the Leverage team creates a global toy craze.

episodes.name: The Long Goodbye Job
episodes.overview: Nate puts everything on the line for himself and his team when he takes on a case that is connected to his son's death.
